about_the_game:
This Happily Ever After DLC continues your relationship storyline with Hilde the Bunny Guard!


STORY

Hilde's little sister, Grizelda, has gone missing!
Even worse, recent reports of a large number of orcs and goblins gathering in the forests suggest she may have been kidnapped. With the family being humble farmers, no match for a goblin war party, they have reached out to the Last Guard, Hilde, as their only hope.

Will you join Hilde on a quest to save her missing sister?

Faulty Apprentice Third DLC-- Bunny Rabbit Rescue!

This DLC update takes place after the GOOD ENDING in the Base game/Main Story. You will also need a save data from Day 20. This DLC contains full body nudity, erotic dialogue, and consensual sexual act.

MAIN FEATURES

  • Sexual Content! - Since this is the Happily Ever After sequel as Hilde's lover, you can now engage in an intimate moment with Hilde, all the way. No more black screen!
  • Fully Voiced! - This DLC features a full English voice-over from the beginning till the end!

JOIN THE COMMUNITY

Join the conversation here or Faulty Apprentice community, and let the AGL studios team know what you think of the game. We read all of the player's feedback!

content_descriptors.notes: This DLC may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Nudity or Sexual Content, General Mature Content. All characters depicted in this game are over the age of 18 and older.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or higher
  • Processor: Intel® Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX compatible card
  • Storage: 2 MB available space
